title: (x) Sween & Salazar, Ltd. logo - Century Schoolbook {Mike Y}
content:
Anybody know what face this is?

Thanks  
-Dave

author: popinfresh

comments.content:
I think Century Schoolbook looks pretty close, including the Italic. At first I thought Clarendon, but the E serifs angle outwards a bit, more like Century.

- Mike Yanega

ween and alazar LTD. is Momentum?
